channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
Okay so my new hoster has a 64 bit computer, and I need a 64 bit compiler. I googled 64 bit compilers for rsps clients and nothing major came back so posting here.
Could anybody brew me up a 64 bit compiler please? Please remember this compiler will be used for the client not the source.
base: pi

Tell me if it works

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @neily00 neily00
item.description:
@neily00 wrote:

Here is the Compiler Code.
You might have to change it to “Program Files” instead of “Program Files (x86)” Plus the 23 to whatever version you have.

@echo off @TITLE YOURSERVERNAMEHERE if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp .;.\AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Credit to Corpbeast (me)

Read full topic
